name: Shift Shaper
description: Test your abilities in a challenging endless run through the shape realms dimension, and compete for glory on the leader boards. Since the invention of the shift drive and the discovery of endless new dimensions existing alongside our own.  The government had to invest in new technology - the Roll Runner was created, a ship that can change its shape to traverse the unknown and dangerous landscapes of these unexplored dimensions. With the invention of this new ship  came a need for a new daring kind of pilot  .. The Shift Shaper .. you are one such pilot! Good luck Captain I plan to update Shift Shaper adding new features in the future, and also respond to player feed back on the game.
